game_description: A mummy girl who has been asleep deep inside a pyramid for more than 1000 years wakes up. She doesn’t know what era is it is, who she is, or the reason she's there. She keeps walking, trying to find the exit. Swing your arms down to stretch the bandage, grab the gimmick with the bandage and jump. The realistic VR and high-speed movement are exhilarating and it feels good. Once you get the hang of it, you will come to know the fun of the game. * Stretching bandage * High speed jump movement * Climbing the wall / Trapeze * Trap that blocks the way * Various game stages * The rank of clearing the stage The video and screenshots were taken with Quest2.
Developer: まこちゃんといっしょ
Publisher: まこちゃんといっしょ
review_1: I mean for 5 bucks this game is pretty fun they should def update it more
review_2: https://fb.gg/v/g5L6TI9-yF/ Did a review for the game well worth the $4.99. Let's just say the bouncing of your anime character girl makes game worth it!!!!
